comment: Guy is an enigma. He is both the nicest and toughest teacher I've ever had. If you do all the essays and tests you will, at minimum, get a B. Even if you have a 60% average, if he sees improvement you will get a good final grade.

If you try, he will make sure you do well. It is a TON of work. We had essays/research papers due at the beginning of each lecture. That being said, he is an AMAZING lecturer and teacher. I retained everything he taught, my writing has also improved immensely. Tests are very difficult but he will generously curve if you have have no missing work.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Amazing lectures--So many papers
